name: Sentinel Spear, 180cm
description: The latex and foam Sentinel spear for LARP and Cosplay has an elven look. This elegant 180cm long weapon has a glaive-like blade and a leather covered haft. It's ideal for any pole arm enthusiast. It's a slashing weapon, not conceived for poking.

name: Yari Spear, 190cm
description: The foam and latex Yari Spear is a 195cm long polearm ideal for LARP and Cosplay. It sports a black lacquered shaft and a long straight blade. Our latex spears were never intended to be used for poking, they are considered slashing weapons.

name: RFB Wood Staff, 190cm
description: RFB Wood Staff Foam Latex Quarterstaff Round flexible glass fibre core has a simulated carved wood grain finish. 190cm. Our latex spears were never intended to be used for poking, they are considered bashing weapons.

name: RFB Steel Staff, 190cm
description: RFB Steel Staff Foam Latex Quarterstaff Round flexible glass fibre core has a simulated Steel finish. 190cm

name: Dervish Spear, 190cm
description: Our Dervish Spear is larp weapon topped by a primitive glaive. This 190cm spear has a curved latex blade with a spike spiked to give it a vengeful appearance. This larp weapon is designed to look worn and realistic and has a wood grain texture with a matte metal finish.

name: Viking Spear, 190cm
description: The foam and latex Viking Spear is a 190cm long polearm ideal for LARP and Cosplay. Its norse wood shaft ends a deadly boar spear blade . Our polearms were never intended to be used for poking, they are slashing weapons only.

name: Braced Staff, 190cm
description: The foam and latex Braced Staff is a 180cm long quarterstaff ideal for LARP and Cosplay. This quarterstaff is made of a wood shaft with steel reinforced braces. It's a bashing weapon, you cannot point with it.

name: KingsGuard Haleberd, 190cm
description: The imperialistic look of this Latex Halberd will draw attention. You can feel free to protect your King, because the core of this magnificent LARP weapon is coated in foam. Although the spear tip is protected it is not recommended to poke. 190cm

name: Rune Spear, 190cm
description: The Latex Rune Spear has a dark, sinister look to it but fits well in a multitude of universes. The entire core of this weapon is coated in foam, thus allowing you to use it as a staff or spear during LARP combat. 190cm

name: Battle Scythe, 190cm
description: From peasants to warriors the Battle Scythe has long since proven it’s worth on the battlefield. From the tip of its long, curved blade to the bottom of it’s shaft this latex polearm is padded for safety yet creates a menacing look. 190cm

name: Wooden Staff, 190cm
description: The foam and latex Walking Staff is a 195cm long quarterstaff for LARP and Cosplay. Its shaft is made of simulated wood with leather straps. Our polearms were never intended to be used for poking, they are bashing weapons only.

name: Staff Mace, 190cm
description: The Doubled-Headed Mace Staff foam and latex is a 190cm long polearm for LARP and Cosplay. This quarterstaff is made of a wood shaft with steel maces on both ends. It's a bashing weapon, you cannot point with it.

name: Arch Mage Staff, 190cm
description: The foam and latex staff of the Arch Mage is a 190cm long arcane quarterstaff ideal for LARP and Cosplay. This ornate staff has a mace-like head piece with a colored gemstone centered between its plates. It's a slashing weapon, not conceived for poking.

name: Naginata Spear, 180cm
description: The foam and latex Naginata  is a 180cm long polearm ideal for LARP and Cosplay. It sports a suede padded shaft and a long straight blade.Our latex spears were never intended to be used for poking, they are considered slashing weapons.

name: Short Wooden Quaterstaff, 150cm
description: Wooden Foam Latex Quarterstaff Round flexible glass fibre core has a simulated carved wood grain finish. 150cm. Our latex polearms were never intended to be used for poking, they are considered slashing weapons.

name: Halbard Polearm, 190cm
description: Foam and Latex 190cm Halberd with round flexible glass fibre core has a simulated carved wood grain finish and a fearsome multiple bladed head.Our latex spears were never intended to be used for poking, they are considered slashing weapons

name: Ancient Spear, 190cm
description: The foam and latex  Ancient Spear is a 190cm long polearm ideal for LARP and Cosplay. Its shaft is remarkably decorated and its sport a deadly spear blade . Our polearms were never intended to be used for poking, they are slashing weapons only.

name: Dark Elven Glaive, 190cm
description: The foam and latex Dark Elven Glaive is a 190cm long polearm ideal for LARP and Cosplay. It has fear inspiring wicked serrated blade.Our latex spears were never intended to be used for poking, they are considered slashing weapons.

name: Dark Elven Staff, 190cm
description: The foam and latex Dark Elven staff is a 180cm long arcane quarterstaff ideal for LARP and Cosplay. This ebony black shaft ends with a bone spear blade. It's a slashing weapon, you cannot point with it.

name: Lorian Glaive, 190cm
description: The foam and latex Glaive of Lorian is a 190cm long ideal for LARP and Cosplay. This Swordstaff sports a long blade etched with delicate elven runes. Our latex spears were never intended to be used for poking, they are considered slashing weapons.

name: Mage Staff, 190cm
description: The foam and latex mage staff is a 195cm long quarterstaff ideal for LARP and Cosplay.This polearm has a white oak shaft with a beautiful magical gem embedded on its head. Our latex staves were never intended to be used for poking, they are considered bashing weapons.

name: Guandao
description: Part of our Ancestral line, the Guando has a heavy scimitar like blade mounted atop a leather bound padded pole. This awesome Chinese inspired weapon will strike fear in your opponents.
